Mathematics.desc: STEM Mathematics is a study of mathematical methods that are typically used in science, engineering, business, and industry with a review of essential concepts from Algebra 2 and Pre-Calculus.  Students will work on application problems which include trigonometry, systems of linear equations, quadratic, exponential, and logarithmic function basics to mathematically model problems and derive solutions with emphasis on the use of technology and other tools.
